publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7749 Linda Fabiani: Scotland’s Makar—That the Parliament congratulates poet and playwright Liz Lochhead on her appointment as Scotland’s Makar; notes the respect and affection within which Ms Lochhead is held by the Scottish public, and looks forward to her continuing role as an ambassador for the poetries of Scotland.

S3M-7749 Scotland’s Makar (lodged on 19 January 2011) Jamie Hepburn*, Jack McConnell*, Maureen Watt*, Nanette Milne*, Jamie McGrigor*, John Scott*, Christopher Harvie*, Michael Matheson*, Rob Gibson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Stewart Maxwell*, Robert Brown*, Patricia Ferguson*, Bill Kidd*, Claire Baker*, Bob Doris*, Liam McArthur*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Patrick Harvie*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Sandra White*

S3M-7749 Linda Fabiani: Scotland’s Makar—That the Parliament congratulates poet and playwright Liz Lochhead on her appointment as Scotland’s Makar; notes the respect and affection within which Ms Lochhead is held by the Scottish public, and looks forward to her continuing role as an ambassador for the poetries of Scotland. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Jack McConnell, Maureen Watt, Nanette Milne, Jamie McGrigor, John Scott, Christopher Harvie, Michael Matheson, Rob Gibson, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Stewart Maxwell, Robert Brown, Patricia Ferguson, Bill Kidd, Claire Baker, Bob Doris, Liam McArthur, Joe FitzPatrick, Patrick Harvie, Hugh O’Donnell, Sandra White, Elaine Smith*, Anne McLaughlin*, Mike Pringle*, Robin Harper*, Mary Scanlon*, Andrew Welsh*
S3M-7749 Scotland’s Makar (lodged on 19 January 2011) Stuart McMillan*
S3M-7749 Scotland’s Makar (lodged on 19 January 2011) Willie Coffey*
S3M-7749 Scotland’s Makar (lodged on 19 January 2011) Dave Thompson*
